net.bytebuddy.asm

接口 MemberSubstitution.Substitution

  • 所有已知实现类:
    MemberSubstitution.Substitution.Compound, MemberSubstitution.Substitution.ForElementMatchers, MemberSubstitution.Substitution.NoOp
    封闭类:
    MemberSubstitution

    protected static interface MemberSubstitution.Substitution
    Resolves an actual substitution.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 接口和说明
      static class  MemberSubstitution.Substitution.Compound
      A compound substitution.
      static class  MemberSubstitution.Substitution.ForElementMatchers
      A substitution that uses element matchers for determining if a byte code element should be substituted.
      static class  MemberSubstitution.Substitution.InvocationType
      Determines a method's invocation type.
      static class  MemberSubstitution.Substitution.NoOp
      A substution that does not substitute any byte code elements.
      static interface  MemberSubstitution.Substitution.Resolver
      A resolver supplies an implementation for a substitution.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      MemberSubstitution.Substitution.Resolver resolve(FieldDescription.InDefinedShape fieldDescription, boolean writeAccess)
      Resolves a field access within a method body.
      MemberSubstitution.Substitution.Resolver resolve(MethodDescription methodDescription, MemberSubstitution.Substitution.InvocationType invocationType)
      Resolves a method invocation within a method body.

    • 方法详细资料

      • resolve

        MemberSubstitution.Substitution.Resolver resolve(FieldDescription.InDefinedShape fieldDescription,
                                                 boolean writeAccess)
        Resolves a field access within a method body.
        参数:
        fieldDescription - The field being accessed.
        writeAccess - true if the access is for writing to the field, false if the field is read.
        返回:
        A resolver for the supplied field access.

      • resolve

        MemberSubstitution.Substitution.Resolver resolve(MethodDescription methodDescription,
                                                 MemberSubstitution.Substitution.InvocationType invocationType)
        Resolves a method invocation within a method body.
        参数:
        methodDescription - The method being invoked.
        invocationType - The method's invocation type.
        返回:
        A resolver for the supplied method invocation.
